[/b][size=60]Guide:[/size][/b]

ctrl+a to select all
shift while selecting to well... select more than one object

while changing the scale:

shift to [b]S Q U A R E[/b]
ctrl to [b]S T A Y[/b]

while changing the angle:

shift to snap to every 5th angle??? idk
ctrl to [b]P O I N T[/b]

events.name: Copying the data and the creating another box with the data

events.comment:
So there is 
center.CenterX()-320/2 (320 being the "properties" panel size)
and
center.CenterY()+288/2 (288 being the "animation" panel size)
are here to center in the view and not from the middle of the screen itself
